an11.3:1.2: Avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ.
an11.3:1.3: Pāmojje asati pāmojjavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti pīti.
an11.3:1.4: Pītiyā asati pītivipannassa hatūpanisā hoti passaddhi.
an11.3:1.5: Passaddhiyā asati passaddhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti sukhaṃ.
an11.3:1.6: Sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi.
an11.3:1.7: Sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ.
an11.3:1.8: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti nibbidā.
an11.3:1.9: Nibbidāya asati nibbidāvipannassa hatūpaniso hoti virāgo.
an11.3:1.10: Virāge asati virāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an11.3:2.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṃ gacchati.
an11.3:2.2: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.3:2.3: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ …pe…
an11.3:3.1: Sīlavato, bhikkhave, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.3:3.2: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ,
an11.3:3.3: pāmojje sati pāmojjasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti pīti,
an11.3:3.4: pītiyā sati pītisampannassa upanisasampannā hoti passaddhi,
an11.3:3.5: passaddhiyā sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti sukhaṃ,
an11.3:3.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi,
an11.3:3.7: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ,
an11.3:3.8: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti nibbidā,
an11.3:3.9: nibbidāya sati nibbidāsampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virāgo,
an11.3:3.10: virāge sati virāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an11.3:4.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṃ gacchati.
an11.3:4.2: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
